questions.quote: ... Anyway I know you told him you didn't have the hat because you didn't want to see him again. And, more sympathetic I could not be. But, I really do need to have the hat back.
He thinks that if a woman sees a guy put on a better show, she'll walk out on his show, go see the other show.
